```{r}
library(arules)
library(arulesViz)
```

### Groceries Data Set
```{r}
data("Groceries")
summary(Groceries)
```
```{r}
inspect(Groceries[1:5])
```

```{r}
rules.all <- apriori(Groceries, parameter = list(supp = 0.05, conf = 0.070,target="rules"))
```

```{r}
inspect(head(rules.all))
```


```{r}
plot(rules.all)
```


```{r}
plot(rules.all, method="grouped")
```
